privacyConsent.title: Privacy Policy
privacyConsent.agreeCheckbox: I agree to the Privacy Policy

privacyPolicy.fullText:
PRIVACY POLICY ‚Äî SenWords

Last updated: 17/02/2026

1. DATA COLLECTION

We collect the following information when you use SenWords:

‚Ä¢ Account information: Display name, email (via SSO login with Google, Facebook, or Apple)
‚Ä¢ Date of birth: For age verification (must be 13 years or older)
‚Ä¢ Learning data: Vocabulary learning progress, scores, learning goals
‚Ä¢ Device information: Device type, OS version (for performance optimization)

Important: We do NOT collect any personal data before you verify your age and agree to this policy.

2. DATA STORAGE

‚Ä¢ Data is securely stored on the Supabase platform with AES-256 encryption
‚Ä¢ Authentication tokens are encrypted with AES-256-GCM on your device
‚Ä¢ We do not store passwords ‚Äî authentication is via SSO providers

3. DATA SHARING

We do NOT sell or share your personal data with third parties, except:

‚Ä¢ SSO providers (Google, Facebook, Apple): Only for login authentication
‚Ä¢ Error analytics service (Sentry): Only anonymous technical data to improve the app
‚Ä¢ Legal requirements: When required by authorized authorities

4. YOUR RIGHTS

You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

‚Ä¢ Right to access: View all data we store about you
‚Ä¢ Right to delete: Request deletion of all personal data
‚Ä¢ Right to export: Download your data in a common format
‚Ä¢ Right to withdraw: Withdraw consent at any time

5. AGE POLICY

‚Ä¢ SenWords is for users aged 13 and above
‚Ä¢ Users under 13 cannot create accounts or use the app
‚Ä¢ If an under-13 user is detected, the account will be immediately disabled

6. CONTACT INFORMATION

If you have questions about the privacy policy, please contact:
‚Ä¢ Email: privacy@senwords.app
‚Ä¢ Address: [Company address]

7. POLICY CHANGES

We may update this policy. When significant changes are made, you will be notified via the app.
